pages.about: About Royal Sands Hotel: Our Journey to Excellence in Mumbai Contact About us Casino About Royal Sands Hotel: Our Journey to Excellence in Mumbai Our Journey to Excellence Royal Sands Hotel was born from a vision to create a haven of luxury and tranquility along Mumbai's vibrant coastline. Our journey began in 2005 when a group of passionate hoteliers identified the need for a world-class beachfront resort that would cater to both international tourists and discerning local guests. Over the years, we've meticulously crafted every aspect of our resort to ensure we stand among the best in the hospitality industry. From our carefully designed suites to our exquisite dining options, we've poured our hearts into creating an environment that exceeds expectations. At Royal Sands Hotel, we understand that each guest is unique, and we value every individual who chooses to stay with us. Our commitment to personalized service means that we go above and beyond to make your stay truly memorable. Whether it's arranging a surprise anniversary celebration or accommodating specific dietary requirements, we strive to make every moment of your stay special. We believe that true luxury lies in the details, and we've dedicated ourselves to perfecting every aspect of your experience. From the moment you step into our lobby until your departure, our goal is to create an atmosphere of warmth, comfort, and unparalleled hospitality. Our Dedicated Team The heart of Royal Sands Hotel is our exceptional team. We've carefully selected and trained each member of our staff to ensure they embody our values of excellence, empathy, and enthusiasm. Our multilingual team is available 24/7 to assist you with any requests or concerns. Whether you need recommendations for local attractions, require assistance with travel arrangements, or simply want to chat about your day, we're always here for you. Our staff includes: Experienced concierge professionals who can help you explore the best of Mumbai Skilled chefs who blend local and international flavors to create culinary masterpieces Certified wellness experts who provide rejuvenating spa treatments and yoga sessions Dedicated housekeeping staff who ensure your accommodations are always immaculate We invest heavily in ongoing training and development for our team members, ensuring they stay up-to-date with the latest hospitality trends and techniques. Many of our staff have been with us for years, allowing them to perfect their skills and develop a deep understanding of our guests' needs. At Royal Sands Hotel, we believe that our success is directly tied to the satisfaction of our guests. That's why we foster a culture of continuous improvement, always seeking feedback and finding new ways to enhance your experience. When you choose Royal Sands Hotel, you're not just selecting a place to stay – you're becoming part of our family. We look forward to welcoming you and creating memories that will last a lifetime. pages.index: Royal Sands Hotel: Your Luxurious Beachfront Escape in Mumbai Contact About us Casino Royal Sands Hotel: Your Luxurious Beachfront Escape in Mumbai Welcome to Royal Sands Hotel Your ultimate beachfront paradise in Mumbai! Immerse yourself in the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and stunning Arabian Sea vistas. Book your stay now and create lasting memories in our tropical haven Book now Royal Sands Hotel is a magnificent 4.5-star all-inclusive resort nestled along the picturesque Juhu Beach in Mumbai. Boasting a prime location on one of Mumbai's finest beaches, our resort offers 340 spacious suites, multiple pools, exquisite dining options, and a wealth of amenities for guests of all ages. Just a short 20-minute drive from Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, we provide the ideal setting for both romantic getaways and family vacations. Our Accommodations: Maharaja Suite Beachfront Perfect for couples, featuring mesmerizing Arabian Sea views. Bollywood Inspired One Bedroom Suite Ideal for small families, complete with a fully equipped kitchen. Mumbai Skyline Two-bedroom Suite ESpacious option for larger groups, accommodating up to 6 adults. Deluxe Two Bedroom Suite Beachfront Our most luxurious offering, with unrivaled sea panoramas. Book now At Royal Sands Hotel, our philosophy revolves around delivering exceptional hospitality and crafting unforgettable experiences for our guests. We strive to offer the perfect balance of relaxation and adventure, ensuring that every visitor discovers their own slice of paradise within our resort. Additional Services: Airport Transfer Begin your vacation stress-free with our convenient airport shuttle service. Ayurvedic Spa Treatments Indulge in rejuvenating therapies at our world-class spa. Yoga and Meditation Experience daily sessions led by expert instructors on our beachfront yoga pavilion. Bollywood Studio Tours Book exciting excursions to explore the wonders of Mumbai's film industry. Guest Testimonials: "The pool bar staff is exceptional! Rahul, Priya, and Amit took great care of us and made our trip amazing. They remembered all our favorite cocktails and kept them coming. It truly made our vacation special!" Aditya Sharma, New Delhi "I had a wonderful stay at this resort! Every staff member I encountered was kind and engaging. Anjali at the front desk was particularly sweet and even gifted me a small token as a member appreciation gesture. Thank you so much, Anjali! I truly appreciate your kindness!" Priya Patel, Bangalore "We absolutely adore Royal Sands Hotel and can't wait to return next year! The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, and we always feel safe here. The grounds are beautiful, and this resort is truly one-of-a-kind. We LOVE it beyond words!" Rajesh and Sunita Gupta, Chennai "This resort is simply amazing. The fusion of local and international flavors in the food, the attentive staff, and everything else were perfect. Arjun from the Indian restaurant and Sandeep at the pool bar were outstanding! We've visited Mumbai many times, and this is now our favorite resort. We'll definitely be back!" pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Royal Sands Hotel Contact About us Casino Royal Sands Hotel Privacy Policy Privacy Policy At Royal Sands Hotel, your privacy is of utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website and utilize our services. Information We Collect We may collect personal information from you when you make a reservation, subscribe to our newsletter, fill out a contact form, or use other services on our website. The information we collect may include your name, email address, phone number, mailing address, and payment details. How We Use Your Information Your personal information is used for the following purposes: To process your reservations and transactions. To improve our website and services based on your feedback and interactions. To send periodic emails regarding your reservations, inquiries, or other services you have requested. To inform you about promotions, special offers, or other information that may be of interest to you, if you have opted in to receive such communications. We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as necessary to fulfill your requests or comply with legal obligations. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. All sensitive information is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and stored in secure databases. Access to your personal information is restricted to authorized personnel only. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. If you wish to exercise these rights or have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at royalsands@gmail.com. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer’s hard drive through your web browser (if you allow) that enables the site’s or service provider’s systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. Changes to This Privacy Policy Royal Sands Hotel reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at royalsands@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing Royal Sands Hotel. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a secure experience. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +912423673432 E-mail: royalsands@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Royal Sands Hotel
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | Royal Sands Hotel Contact About us Casino Terms and Conditions - Royal Sands Hotel Terms and Conditions Welcome to Royal Sands Hotel. By accessing our website and using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions: Reservations All reservations made through our website are subject to availability and confirmation. You will receive a confirmation email once your booking is successfully processed. Please ensure that all details provided are accurate to avoid any issues upon check-in. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in time is from 2:00 PM, and check-out time is by 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Cancellation Policy Reservations can be cancelled or modified up to 24 hours before the scheduled arrival date without any charges. Cancellations made within 24 hours of the arrival date will be subject to a one-night stay charge. Payment Payments for reservations can be made using major credit cards or other accepted payment methods as indicated on our website. Full payment may be required at the time of booking or upon check-in. Guest Conduct Guests are expected to conduct themselves in a respectful and orderly manner while on the hotel premises. Any behavior that disrupts the comfort of other guests or damages property may result in immediate termination of the stay without a refund. Privacy We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for detailed information on how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information. Liability Royal Sands Hotel is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury sustained by guests during their stay, except where such liability cannot be excluded by law. Guests are advised to take appropriate precautions and secure their personal belongings. Changes to Terms Royal Sands Hotel reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on our website, and it is the guest's responsibility to review these terms periodically. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at royalsands@gmail.com. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +912423673432 E-mail: royalsands@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Royal Sands Hotel
